name: Curse of the Tethered Heart
description:
All is fair in love and war.

A vicious warlord with a long history of conflict and murder most foul, you have been inflicted with a horrible curse as a punishment for your many transgressions: any hurt you inflict upon another is inflicted back upon you. Now you must learn to make friends rather than foes, by giving gifts to win their hearts.

A top-down 2D adventure game.

Controls

WASD - move
Left Click - give items
Right Click - attack

Move over an item on the map to pick it up!

Team Thoughts Loading

Kirthika Piratla - Environment Art & Programming
Sophia Evanisko - Programming & Intro-Outro Scenes
Kaylin Archuleta - Character Art & Animations
Jesse Forgione - Music & Sound Design

Tools and Assets

All assets (including sound effects) were created by the team!

The game was created in Unity.
